text: Sin agabuy cabbiimey miyangali kak yiggiriqqeey miyangalik yobboode, isin ken qiddat agaywaagitteenik ken qidda sidiica alsa kinni, kaadu qunxa sayyóy miyangali baahe waytâ qiddà tonna, agabuk Bagut lagbî qiddah wakti, usun bagut lon xalay oobisaanama edde taadem. Yallak meesitah yan numuh, Yalli kay caagid addunyaay akeeral kaah xabbacoysah
